name: Fantasy Defense
description: Evil woke up! Horde of an evil wizard, which is ready to seize all kingdom of Hamdar. Ahead of you is a difficult task - build a powerful defensive system and throw an evil army into Hell. 12 levels and more than 6 hours of gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x32 Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT or AMD HD 4870 with 1GB of memory (DX 10, 10.1, 11) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1800 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 (4 cores) at 2.40 GHz or AMD Phenom 9850 (4 cores) with a frequency of 2.5 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD HD7870 with 2 GB of memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1800 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 11compatible
